name: Chess - Chess Online
description:
Are you a chess master?
Or just a beginner? It doesn't matter!
Our chess game absolutely is one of the well-designed chess games, and it has designed for both behinners and advanced players. Download our game, play it, and enjoy the happy time!

-Selectable board skin and game difficulty
-Hint function is available
- Endgame mode, AI mode and two-player mode
-Save game progress
- Intelligent AI with nationality and unique characters
You can develop your chess strategy and chess tactics, meet the challenge and become a chess master immediately!

Subscription notice:Payment will be charged to your account at confirmation of purchase.Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
